attributes.action: Legislate for 10% of corporate profits to be donated to British charities
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to pass a law so that all businesses trading on the British stock exchange give 10% of their pretax profits to British based charities.

I believe with all my heart, soul, strength and mind that this will lead to an instant recovery of our economy.

It will lead to social housing programs around the Country.

It will lead to apprenticeships for all school leavers.

It will provide funding for ALL the deserving causes we have within our borders with extra for International Aid.

I believe with all my heart, soul, strength and mind that God wants the people to force the super rich to take responsibility for those in need.

Should they choose to do so, Our Government can set an enlightened example for other mighty nations to follow.
